channel.title: Making a Team to Make Pest Control for Private Servers!
channel.description:
[center][b]Making a Team to Make Pest Control for Private Servers![/b]
Whats happening is harvey has figured out how to get the coords for pc to work so i thought why not make pest control
What i want to do is add all the perks of pest control
[u][b]Ideas:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Adding all the shops as pest control such as range mage bankers and general (easy)[/li] [li]Making the Banks Booths work (easy but need to get ids of them)[/li] [li]Making it so when a certain amount of people are on a boat are teleported to pc area (medium, MABEY)[/li] [li]Adding Portals for people to kill and when it dead it dissapears (medium)[/li] [li]Making it so when all the portals are dead the game is over(idk)[/li] [li]Adding pc points (easy like adding pk points)[/li] [li]Adding new monster for new game (hard)[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Source Being Used:[/b][/u] PimpScape
[u][b]Coders[/b][/u] Rich Kid Open Open Open Open Open
Thanks and i hope we can get this done!
[u][b]Application[/b][/u] [code][b]In-Game Name:[/b] [b]How Long Have You Been Coding:[/b][/code][/center]

item.title: Making a Team to Make Pest Control for Private Servers!
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

I’ve already got these done but sorry I want to accomplish this myself

[ul][li]Adding all the shops as pest control such as range mage bankers and general (easy)[/li]
[li]Making the Banks Booths work (easy but need to get ids of them)[/li]
[li]Making it so when a certain amount of people are on a boat are teleported to pc area (medium, MABEY)[/li]
[li]Adding Portals for people to kill and when it dead it dissapears (medium)[/li]
[li]Making it so when all the portals are dead the game is over(idk)[/li]
[li]Adding pc points (easy like adding pk points)[/li]
[li]Adding new monster for new game (hard)[/li][/ul]

Dunno what you mean by the last one is though. Also your missing some, having the npcs try and fight the void knight but can’t walk through walls, having the portals not follow you and attack back when you attack, and a lot of timers… I have the timers and all the doors, planks stuff like that coded but the npcs attacking and stuff will be hard. Oh do you mean respawning the monsters after the game is over? That’s a lot easier than it looks I’ve done that too. I might release when I’m done

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Team to Make Pest Control for Private Servers!
